                class AppleAuthController < ApplicationController
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                  skip_before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                  def create
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                    id_token = params[:id_token]
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                    return render_error("id_token is required", :bad_request) if id_token.blank?
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                      claims = decode_apple_token(id_token)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                      return render_error("Invalid token", :unauthorized) unless claims
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                      apple_user_id = claims["sub"]
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                      email = claims["email"]
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                      name = params[:name] # Apple only sends name on first auth
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Use UserFinder service for consistent user lookup/creation
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                      user = UserFinder.find_or_create_by_apple(
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                        apple_user_id: apple_user_id,
          
      24.

                      if user.persisted?

                  def decode_apple_token(id_token)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Decode without verification first to get the key id
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                    header = JSON.parse(Base64.decode64(id_token.split(".").first))
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                    kid = header["kid"]
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Fetch Apple's public keys
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                    apple_keys = fetch_apple_public_keys
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                    key_data = apple_keys.find { |k| k["kid"] == kid }
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                    return nil unless key_data
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Build the public key
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                    jwk = JWT::JWK.new(key_data)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Decode and verify the token
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                    decoded = JWT.decode(
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                      id_token,
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                      jwk.public_key,
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                      true,
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                      {
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                        algorithm: "RS256",
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                        iss: "https://appleid.apple.com",
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                        verify_iss: true,
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                        aud: ENV["APPLE_BUNDLE_ID"],
          
      67.

                        verify_aud: true
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68.

      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69.

      70.

              # Apply pagination to an ActiveRecord::Relation

              #

              # @param query [ActiveRecord::Relation]

              # @param page [Integer, String, nil]

              # @param per_page [Integer, String, nil]

              # @return [Hash] { records:, pagination: }

              def paginate(query, page:, per_page:, default_per_page: DEFAULT_PER_PAGE, max_per_page: MAX_PER_PAGE)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
              8
            

            
              
            

                p = normalize_positive_int(page, fallback: 1)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
              8
            

            
              
            

                pp = normalize_per_page(per_page, default_per_page:, max_per_page:)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
              8
            

            
              
            

                offset = (p - 1) * pp
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
              8
            

            
              
            

                total = query.count
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
              8
            

            
              
            

                records = query.limit(pp).offset(offset)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
              8
            

            
              
            

                  records: records,
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                  pagination: {
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                    page: p,
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                    per_page: pp,
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                    total: total,
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
              8
            

            
              
            

                    total_pages: (total.to_f / pp).ceil

              def order(query, order_by:, order_direction:, valid_columns:, default_column: :created_at, default_direction: :desc)

    48.

    49.

              def normalize_positive_int(value, fallback:)

            class ApplicationJob < ActiveJob::Base
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              # Database deadlocks are transient
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              retry_on ActiveRecord::Deadlocked, wait: :exponentially_longer, attempts: 3
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

              # If a record was deleted before the job runs, drop it
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              discard_on ActiveJob::DeserializationError

    9. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

              # Retry only known transient network errors (not all StandardError)

              TRANSIENT_ERRORS = [

              1
            

            
              
            

                Timeout::Error,
          
      13.

    14.

                SocketError,

                Net::OpenTimeout,

    18. 
            

            
              
            

                Net::ReadTimeout
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

              ].freeze
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              TRANSIENT_ERRORS.each do |klass|
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
              7

              def connection_pool_stats

                pool = ActiveRecord::Base.connection_pool

                {
          
      61.

              def table_sizes
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                result = ActiveRecord::Base.connection.execute(<<~SQL)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                  SELECT#{' '}
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                    relname as table_name,
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                    pg_size_pretty(pg_total_relation_size(relid)) as total_size,
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                    pg_total_relation_size(relid) as size_bytes
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                  FROM pg_catalog.pg_statio_user_tables
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                  ORDER BY pg_total_relation_size(relid) DESC
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                  LIMIT 10
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                SQL
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                result.to_a
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81.

      82.

      84.

            class JwtCleanupJob < ApplicationJob
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              queue_as :maintenance

      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              # Run daily to clean up expired JWT tokens from the denylist
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

              # Tokens are added when users sign out or when tokens are revoked
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

              # After expiration, they no longer need to be in the denylist
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

              #
          
      10.

              # Schedule with sidekiq-cron or call from a cron job:
          
      11.

              #   JwtCleanupJob.perform_later
          
      12.

              #

              1
            

            
              
            

              def perform
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
              3
            

            
              
            

                expired_count = JwtDenylist.where("exp < ?", Time.current).delete_all

                  event: "jwt_cleanup_completed",

                  remaining_tokens: JwtDenylist.count
          
      20.

                )

      22.

                # Track in Sentry for observability
          
      23.

                  then: 0

            class RecurringTaskGenerationJob < ApplicationJob
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              queue_as :default
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              # Run every hour to generate upcoming recurring task instances
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

              # This ensures users see their recurring tasks even if they don't
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

              # complete the previous instance
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

              #
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

              # Schedule with sidekiq-cron:
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

              #   RecurringTaskGenerationJob.perform_later
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

              #
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

              def perform
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                generated_count = 0
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                error_count = 0
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                # Find all recurring templates
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                templates = Task
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                              .where(is_template: true, template_type: "recurring")
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                              .where(deleted_at: nil)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                              .includes(:list, :creator)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                templates.find_each do |template|
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Skip if template's list is deleted
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                  next if template.list.deleted?
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Check if we need to generate the next instance
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                  latest_instance = template.instances
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                                            .where(deleted_at: nil)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                                            .where.not(status: "done")
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                                            .order(due_at: :desc)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                                            .first
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                  # If no pending instance exists, generate one
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                  if latest_instance.nil?
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                    begin
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                      service = RecurringTaskService.new(template.creator)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                      last_completed = template.instances
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                                               .where(status: "done")
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                                               .order(due_at: :desc)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                                               .first
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                      if last_completed
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                        service.generate_next_instance(last_completed)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                        generated_count += 1
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                    rescue StandardError => e
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                      error_count += 1
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                      Rails.logger.error(
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                        event: "recurring_task_generation_failed",
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                        template_id: template.id,
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                        error: e.message
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                      )
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                      Sentry.capture_exception(e, extra: { template_id: template.id })
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info(
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                  event: "recurring_task_generation_completed",
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                  templates_checked: templates.count,
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                  tasks_generated: generated_count,
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                  errors: error_count
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      66.

              def prevent_circular_subtask_relationship

              def recurrence_constraints

            class TaskEvent < ApplicationRecord
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              include SoftDeletable
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              belongs_to :task
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              belongs_to :user

            # TodayTasksQuery encapsulates the complex queries for the Today view.

            # Provides methods for fetching:

            #   - Overdue tasks (past due, not completed)

              def initialize(user, timezone: nil)

            # AlertingService provides threshold-based alerting for application metrics.

                def threshold_exceeded?(current, threshold, comparison)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
              7
            

            
              
                
                  when: 7
                
              
            

                  case comparison
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
              7
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                  when :greater_than then current > threshold
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                  when :less_than then current < threshold
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  when :equals then current == threshold
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                  else false
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104.

                def task_created(task, user)

              26
            

            
              
                
                  then: 26
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      due_in_hours: task.due_at ? ((task.due_at - Time.current) / 1.hour).round : nil
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                    }
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                  )

                private

              1
            

            
              
            

                def record(user:, event_type:, metadata: {}, task: nil, list: nil)
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
              58
            

            
              
            

                  AnalyticsEvent.create!(
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

                    user: user,
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

                    task: task,
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                    list: list,
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                    event_type: event_type,
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                    metadata: metadata,
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                    occurred_at: Time.current
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue StandardError => e
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error("AnalyticsTracker failed: #{e.message}")
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Don't raise - analytics should never break the app
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      206.

    app/services/application_monitor.rb

    80.77% lines covered

    46.15% branches covered

    52 relevant lines. 42 lines covered and 10 lines missed.
    13 total branches, 6 branches covered and 7 branches missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            
              
            

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            # ApplicationMonitor provides a centralized interface for tracking
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

            # custom application metrics and events. It wraps Sentry and logs
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5.

                # Track timing of a block
          
      35.

              1
            

            
              
            

                def track_timing(operation_name, tags: {})
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  start_time = Process.clock_gettime(Process::CLOCK_MONOTONIC)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  result = yield
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  duration_ms = ((Process.clock_gettime(Process::CLOCK_MONOTONIC) - start_time) * 1000).round(2)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  track_metric("#{operation_name}.duration_ms", duration_ms, tags: tags)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Alert on slow operations
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
              1
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 1
                
              
            

                  if duration_ms > 5000 # 5 seconds
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                    alert("Slow operation: #{operation_name}",
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                          severity: :warning,
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                          duration_ms: duration_ms,
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                          tags: tags)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  result
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51.

                # Send an alert (shows up prominently in Sentry)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def alert(message, severity: :warning, **context)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
              1
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                  level = case severity
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 1
                
              
            

                  when :critical, :error then :error
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
              1
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  when :warning then :warning
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                  else :info
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            
              1
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 1
                
              
            

                  Rails.logger.send(level == :info ? :info : :warn,
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                                    event: "alert",
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                                    message: message,
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                                    severity: severity,
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                                    context: context
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      68.

                  send_to_sentry("Alert: #{message}", context, level: level)
          
      69.

                def track_error(error, **context)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error(
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                    event: "error_tracked",

      76.

      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
              1
            

            
              
                
                  then: 1

      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81.

                def send_to_sentry(message, context, level:)
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
              2
            

            
              
                
                  else: 2
                
              
                
                  then: 0

                def initialize(email:, password:)

                def call!

              def generate_next_instance(completed_instance)

                next_due_date = calculate_next_due_date(template, completed_instance.due_at)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                return nil if next_due_date.nil?
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                return nil if template.recurrence_end_date && next_due_date.to_date > template.recurrence_end_date
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                generate_instance(
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                  template,
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                  instance_number: (completed_instance.instance_number || 0) + 1,
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                  due_date: next_due_date
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      56.

      57.

              def generate_instance(template, instance_number:, due_date:)

              def calculate_next_due_date(template, last_due_date)
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                return nil unless last_due_date
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                interval = template.recurrence_interval || 1
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                base_time = template.recurrence_time || last_due_date
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                case template.recurrence_pattern
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                when "daily"
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                  next_date = last_due_date.to_date + interval.days
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                  combine_date_and_time(next_date, base_time)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                when "weekly"
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                  days = template.recurrence_days || [ last_due_date.wday ]
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                  next_date = find_next_weekday(last_due_date.to_date + 1.day, days, interval)
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                  combine_date_and_time(next_date, base_time)
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                when "monthly"
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                  next_date = last_due_date.to_date + interval.months
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                  combine_date_and_time(next_date, base_time)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                when "yearly"
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                  next_date = last_due_date.to_date + interval.years
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                  combine_date_and_time(next_date, base_time)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                  nil
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

              def find_next_weekday(from_date, allowed_days, interval = 1)
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                current = from_date
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                start_week = from_date.beginning_of_week
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                100.times do
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                  current_week = current.beginning_of_week
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                  weeks_diff = ((current_week - start_week) / 7).to_i
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                  if allowed_days.include?(current.wday) && (weeks_diff % interval).zero?
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                    return current
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                  current += 1.day
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                from_date + 7.days
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

              def recurrence_ended?(template, last_instance)
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                return true if template.recurrence_end_date && Date.current > template.recurrence_end_date
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                return true if template.recurrence_count && last_instance.instance_number >= template.recurrence_count
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                false
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      131.

              def combine_date_and_time(date, time)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                return date.to_datetime.beginning_of_day if time.nil?
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                Time.zone.local(
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                  date.year,
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                  date.month,
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                  date.day,
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                  time.hour,
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                  time.min,
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                  0
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143.

    145. 
            

            
              
            

                return nil if datetime.nil?
          
      146.

              def check_previous_days!
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
              7
            

            
              
            

                today = Date.current

              7
            

            
              
            

                last_checked = @user.last_streak_date
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                # First time user
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
              7
            

            
              
                
                  then: 7
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return if last_checked.nil?
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      23.

                # Already checked today
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return if last_checked == today
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      26.

                # Check each day since last check
          
      27.

    29. 
            

            
              
                
                  body: 0
                
              
            

                while date_to_check < today

    30. 
            

            
              
            

                  if had_tasks_due?(date_to_check) && !completed_all_tasks?(date_to_check)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    # Streak broken
          
      32.

                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    @user.current_streak = 0

      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    # Streak continues
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                    @user.current_streak += 1
          
      36.

      38.

              def had_tasks_due?(date)

              def completed_all_tasks?(date)

              def tasks_due_on(date)
